body_html:
when I use remote intepreter in my linux, I encounter the problem in my local windows Pycharm:
ImportError: libcublsa.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

any updates on this matter? I have the same issue, remote interpreter, connected to AWS-GPU instance. I can start python scripts without problems over ssh, but when running from PyCharm i get the same error

body:
> when I use remote intepreter in my linux, I encounter the problem in my local windows Pycharm:
> ImportError: libcublsa.so.9.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory

any updates on this matter? I have the same issue, remote interpreter, connected to AWS-GPU instance. I can start python scripts without problems over ssh, but when running from PyCharm i get the same error
